Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on the shipment. The valid values for Action are Modify, Create-Modify, Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Attribute.Name: CreateOneLoadPerShipment
Attribute.Description: Indicates if each shipment should be converted into a separate load. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: OverrideModificationRules
Attribute.Description: OverrideModificationRules is used to override the statuses of shipment that can be considered for various modifications. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: RemoveShipmentsOnDelete
Attribute.Description: RemoveContentOnDelete is applicable only when the Action is Delete. The system by default deletes only empty loads or in other words, a load with no shipments included in it. However, if you wish to delete a load even if it comprises of shipments, set this attribute to Y. Valid values are Y, N and Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on a load shipment. The valid values for Action are Modify, Create-Modify, Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on a load stop. The valid values for Action are Modify, Create-Modify, Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on a load charge. The valid values for Action are Modify, Create-Modify, Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Attribute.Name: ChargeNameKey
Attribute.Description: Primary key for a charge name.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the regular table or the history table. Valid values are Y and N.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on an instruction. The valid values for Action are Modify, Create-Modify, Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Indicates the action that can be perfomed on an additional date. The valid values for Action are Modify, Create-Modify, Delete or Void(blanks). In case when Action is Void, it is treated as Create-Modify.

Attribute.Name: FromActualDate
Attribute.Description: From Actual date criteria for shipment list.

Attribute.Name: FromExpectedDate
Attribute.Description: From Expected date criteria for shipment list.

Attribute.Name: FromRequestedDate
Attribute.Description: From Requested date criteria for shipment list.

Attribute.Name: ToActualDate
Attribute.Description: To Actual date criteria for shipment list.

Attribute.Name: ToExpectedDate
Attribute.Description: To Expected date criteria for shipment list.

Attribute.Name: ToRequestedDate
Attribute.Description: To Requested date criteria for shipment list.
